ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow!  SS BP!!!  was: Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: Shada i gotta ask ya, what was your strategy to killing trak? we were thinking of sending in air pets first to set off the proc (since they re pretty immune to
ygData.messageBody:
Shada i gotta ask ya, what was your strategy to killing trak? we were
thinking of sending in air pets first to set off the proc (since they're
pretty immune to poison and that will give us 45 seconds free of poison)
before we send in the troops as our first attempt at him got everyone
slaughtered. Mind sharing how you guys did it? Even thinking of maybe using
the cleric spell (lev55) that allows all tanks to get 10hp back each time
they hit (but duel wielding/quad attacking tanks will get 40hp back per
round, making them take less dmg overall in the log run). There's a few
strategies being worked on right now, but i was wondering if ya could shed
some light on the subject 8)

Any tips/strategies?

On a funny note, a monk of ours was roaming near trak and got casted on, hit
once and fd with 25hp, he FD his way to the zone, funny screenshots.

-Rakka
VVV Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 10:08 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow! SS BP!!! was: Carnal pauldrons


thanks :)

well he hits for 630 damage, his poison dot does an initial 1500 damage i
think, plus 150 per tick for 10 ticks. i have only lived 1 of 8 trak kills
and i was in FV when i heard about my BP, but it's a great feeling wearing
it :) and now that we can kill Venril Sathir again (last night for the
first time since he was buffed) i got a chance at legs and a full set of
singing steel minus the bracer.

Shada Iceheart, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr

p.s. on our most recent trak raid, much to my shock i learned that a gnome,
the vile Xaxe, had been admitted into the Powa clan, sworn enemies of the
evil Keplegrobs and all things gnomish! it broke my heart to leave the clan
of which i was so proud, but it was tainted and i could stay no longer.


> Woooo hoooo! Shada!!!!! WTG!~ GRATZ!!! Nice BP!!!
>
> Ya gotta tell us about Trakanon!
>
> Sylly
